item.title: ChatGPT's AI coder Codex now lets you choose the best solution
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: ChatGPT's Codex, which is an AI agent that lets you code and delegate programming tasks, is now testing a new feature that lets you choose the best solution. [...]

item.title: ChatGPT Search gets an upgrade as OpenAI takes aim at Google
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: On June 13, OpenAI began rolling out a new ChatGPT Search update to improve quality as the AI startup challenges Google's dominance. [...]

item.title: Over 46,000 Grafana instances exposed to account takeover bug
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: More than 46,000 internet-facing Grafana instances remain unpatched and exposed to a client-side open redirect vulnerability that allows executing a malicious plugin and account takeover. [...]

item.title: WestJet investigates cyberattack disrupting internal systems
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: WestJet, Canada's second-largest airline, is investigating a cyberattack that has disrupted access to some internal systems as it responds to the breach. [...]

item.title: Anubis ransomware adds wiper to destroy files beyond recovery
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: <The Anubis ransomware-as-a-service (RaaS) operation has added to its file-encrypting malware a wiper module that destroys targeted files, making recovery impossible even if the ransom is paid. [...]

item.title: Windows 11 users want these five features back
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: When Windows 11 was first released, many long-time users felt features they loved had been taken away overnight. Three and a half years later, the same complaints still rise to the top of the Feedback Hub with tens of thousands of votes. [...]

item.title: Google links massive cloud outage to API management issue
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Google says an API management issue is behind Thursday's massive Google Cloud outage, which disrupted or brought down its services and many other online platforms. [...]

item.title: Discord flaw lets hackers reuse expired invites in malware campaign
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Hackers are hijacking expired or deleted Discord invite links to redirect users to malicious sites that deliver remote access trojans and information-stealing malware. [...]

item.title: Microsoft: KB5060533 update triggers boot errors on Surface Hub v1 devices
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is investigating a known issue that triggers Secure Boot errors and prevents Surface Hub v1 devices from starting up. [...]

item.title: Microsoft confirms auth issues affecting Microsoft 365 users
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is investigating an ongoing incident that is causing users to experience errors with some Microsoft 365 authentication features. [...]

item.title: Victoria’s Secret restores critical systems after cyberattack
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Victoria's Secret has restored all critical systems impacted by a May 24 security incident that forced it to shut down corporate systems and the e-commerce website. [...]

item.title: Cloudflare: Outage not caused by security incident, data is safe
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Cloudflare has confirmed that the massive service outage yesterday was not caused by a security incident and no data has been lost. [...]
